    • Method Detail

      • bindNonce

        public void bindNonce(AccountState accountState)
        Description copied from interface: NonceProvider
        Bind nonce of accountState with accountAddress of accountState. The operation must be thread-safe.
        Specified by:
        bindNonce in interface NonceProvider
        Parameters:
        accountState - an account state

      • bindNonce

        public void bindNonce(AccountAddress accountAddress,
                      long nonce)
        Description copied from interface: NonceProvider
        Bind nonce to accountAddress. Next time nonce is required, it will be provided on base of passed nonce. The operation must be thread-safe.
        Specified by:
        bindNonce in interface NonceProvider
        Parameters:
        accountAddress - an account address
        nonce - an nonce

      • incrementAndGetNonce

        public long incrementAndGetNonce(AccountAddress accountAddress)
        Description copied from interface: NonceProvider
        Get next nonce of accountAddress and increment it. If an nonce of accountAddress is not binded yet, it will be treated as new account (nonce starts from 0). The operation must be thread-safe.
        Specified by:
        incrementAndGetNonce in interface NonceProvider
        Parameters:
        accountAddress - an accountAddress
        Returns:
        an nonce

      • getLastUsedNonce

        public long getLastUsedNonce(AccountAddress accountAddress)
        Description copied from interface: NonceProvider
        Get last used nonce of accountAddress If an nonce of accountAddress is not binded yet, it will be treated as new account (nonce starts from 0). The operation must be thread-safe.
        Specified by:
        getLastUsedNonce in interface NonceProvider
        Parameters:
        accountAddress - an accountAddress
        Returns:
        an nonce
